inclusion.criterion: ascending aortic or aortic root pathology
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: associated stable one or two vessel coronary disease
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: recurrent severe AI after prior bicuspid repair
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: annular dilatation in patients with chronic AI and dilated annulus
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: restoration of a circular annular shape
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: willingness to comply with follow-up evaluations
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: mixed stenosis and regurgitation of the aortic valve with predominant stenosis
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: heavily calcified BAV valves or calcified aortic roots
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: history of bleeding diathesis or coagulopathy
exclusion.label: unknown

notes: Patient has severe aortic stenosis with worsening LV function, EF was 25%. He underwent cardiac cath and right heart cath to evaluate pulm art pressures.
